learnings.content: Exam Prep Platform: Calculus 2 study tool with 5 free credits, analysis costs 2 credits, questions cost 1 credit. Pricing: $10/10 credits or $20 unlimited. Tech: SvelteKit + Cloudflare Workers + Turso + Stripe. Professor-approved university policy for old exams.
Ralph Loop cancellation: Delete state file at .claude/ralph-loop.local.md to stop loop without deleting plugin
Semantic Memory CPU limits: Ollama limited to 0.1 CPUs via Docker, daemon uses cpulimit -l 10 or nice -n 19
Plan cancellation: Rename plan file from plan-name.md to plan-name.CANCELLED.md to stop stop-hook prompts
Ultimate Coding Workflow: swarm-planner (dependency-aware plans) -> parallel-task (parallel execution) OR subagent-driven-development (two-stage review). Always use git-worktrees for isolation.
